name: Abraham 13
text_appearance: ABERAHAM 13 stands 6'3 tall with an utilitarian design. His chassis has long since lost its red colouration instead being replaced with grime and the exposed scratching of the titanium frame underneath. To protect himself against the elements he was equiped with a custom synth leather duster and wide brimmed hat, evoking the image of a gunslinger from ancient Cradle. Equiped in his duster are 2 heavy duty rail revolvers and one large anti vehicle hand cannon no normal pilot could equip without some enhancement.
history:
400 years ago, a few years after the third comm revolution the Union DOJ had come up with a solution to a problem that had long availed them. War criminals, pirates and warlords had established little hermit kingdoms in the wake of the Union civil war. In these desperate times the DOJ had created the prototype ABRAHAM class NHP, a new independent NHP tasked with delivering justice to these unlawful regions of space. Only a hundred were made at first, sent into the black aboard cosmopolitan ships to seed the spiral arm with justice. However these units over time were gradually lost. Be it in combat, accidents or perhaps some went AWOL. No new ABRAHAM’s were produced, the DOJ labeling the project a failure.

ABRAHAM 13 was recovered by a team of scrappers, thinking he was just some strange subaltern design or a unique model. When they discovered the Union DOJ logo on his chassis and saw he had an NHP coffin they knew they had stumbled upon something that shouldn't exist. ABE 13 was awoken by one of crew mates, curious about their find. He asked to be transported to Hercynia, wishing to follow his last objective. The scrappers took him to a station to undergo repairs and await a union DOJ representative they had called in. ABE secretly had changed his diagnostics to appear more damaged than was actually present. At his first opportunity he sneaked away, unknowingly avoiding the DOJ representative and slid into the background of the universe.


ABE 13 had been working through versious mercenary companies since his awakening. Hoping to travel from planet to planet to his objective of Hercynia. Though it took more time than was originally planned he was within arms reach of dispensing justice to this war torn world.

systems.flavorDescription: Breach/blast charges offer a mil-spec twist on the industrial blasting charges developed by IPS-N for asteroid mining. The IPS-N BB charge features a more volatile blend of high explosives designed to cause massive structural damage to mechanized chassis, starship bulkheads, armored vehicles, bunkers, and other hardened structures.
By installing additional armor plating, redundant firing circuits, and enhanced insulation to magazines the longevity of a frame’s armaments can be greatly enhanced.

weapon.flavorDescription:
Much like GMS mechs, GMS weapons are reliable galactic standards, made using interchangeable parts and built to withstand almost any conditions. There are three lines currently in production.
The Type-I (T-1) line is defined by powerful, reliable, and conventional-kinetic ranged and melee weapons, including the GMS assault rifle, heavy machine gun, shotgun, pistol, and various light and heavy blades. Reliable galactic standards, the GMS T-1 line is the most widely used mech-scale line of weaponry across the galaxy. Echoing the Everest’s design notes, T-1 weapons are simply designed, with few (if any) moving parts, intended to be used in or adaptable to any environment.

The IPS-N hand cannon is a licensed version of GMS’s Type-I Pistol, adapted for a much heavier caliber. This modification requires the belt-fed system of the GMS build to be swapped for a cylinder or magazine-based system, depending on the specific model of hand cannon.

systems.flavorDescription: Packed into sealed, self-contained cylinders, IPS-N’s “Roland Rounds” are high-explosive anti-armor charges built for kinetic weapons of any mech-scale caliber. Loaded in place of inert kinetic ammunition, a Roland HE/AA shell increases the efficacy and destructive power of any weapon it is fired from.
This program talks, quietly, of revenge, of the ordering of things, of a march of blades lifted high against the sun.

Popular among colonial militias, the plasma maul is a heavy but simple device. High-density magnetic plasma capacitors have a wide range of applications, from power storage through to construction and defense. In the case of the plasma maul, they are mounted in rows along a reinforced haft and set to discharge on contact, making this a devastating closequarters weapon limited only by its need to recharge between strikes. Early models featured ejectable capacitor banks, but contemporary versions are designed to draw power directly from a chassis’ reactor.

reserves.name: Patience Hookup
reserves.label: Resource
reserves.description: You have a direct line to Patience. Spend this reserve to gain +1 ACCURACY on all skill checks and saves for a scene (even in combat) as Patience helps you out.

reserves.name: Talent Point
reserves.label: Bonus
reserves.description: Add a Talent Point to gain or improve a Pilot Talent.

bondPowers.name: Go for a Walk
bondPowers.description:
If you go off by yourself to accomplish a task, name your goal. You’ll return to the group next scene successful, having accomplished it off-screen, but the GM chooses one
  • You have to hurt someone innocent.
  • You raise an alarm, come back with pursuers, or start a ticking clock.
  • You come back hurt, taking 2 Stress.
If the task was too dangerous, difficult, or complicated to accomplish alone, the GM will tell you that when you return, but will also tell you exactly what needs to be done to finish it. Gain increased effect when you take action to finish the task.

bondPowers.name: Pounce
bondPowers.description: You take an action before any NPCs have the chance to act, giving you a free roll. Hostile NPCs can’t deal harm or consequences to you as a part of this roll (they’re too slow), although you can still fail or suffer other consequences normally.

bondAnswers: A long time spent alone in the cold, a time you’d rather forget.
The blood in your past that’s catching up to you.
minorIdeal: I showed someone how it’s done.

armor.flavorDescription: These hardsuits, common among military units, feature heavier plating than light hardsuits but more mobility than heavy hardsuits. They are powered, augmenting the user’s strength, and typically feature an onboard computer, sensor suite, integrated air, burst EVA system, and waste recycling systems.

weapons.flavorDescription: Heavy signature weapons are missile tubes, heavy lasers, light machine gun, or exotic rifles.
Medium signature weapons are assault rifles, shotguns, pack-fed lasers, or disruption guns.

gear.flavorDescription: A powerful electronic scope that provides high-resolution magnification up to two miles, and automatically adjusts its reticle for wind, gravity, and pressure. Smart scopes can project their field of vision and all data to the HUD of any networked user. They can also pair with other thermal, optical, or simulated-vision devices to further enhance targeting.
A miniaturized version of Union’s full-scale printers, handheld printers can be used to make simple objects out of flexible and durable plastic – as long as you have the right pattern chip.

Small, non-combat drones are a common sight in the field. They’re fairly noisy but can fly about half a mile with good maneuverability before losing signal, relaying audio and visual information as they go.
